opinion.posture: Petition for post-conviction relief. Appeal, No. 1160, Oct. T., 1968, from order of Court of Quarter Sessions of Blair County, June T., 1964, Nos. 97 and 98, opinion by JUBELIRER, J. Submitted December 9, 1968.
opinion.attorneys: Paul S. Foreman, for appellant;John Woodcock, Jr., Assistant District Attorney, for Commonwealth, appellee.
